title: I connect my Sony Headphones to my PHONE it starts playing whatever was playing last. WHY?
content:
Whenever I connect my Sony Headphones to my GOOGLE PIXEL PHONE it starts playing whatever was playing last (even though that program is muted)
so I could pick up the phone wanting to play YouTube but it starts playing audible
this could be a GOOGLE PIXEL problem or a Sony Problem? I want it to stop
